title: Everglades National Park: Meeting Notices
body: Meeting Notices       Park Planning >> Acquisiton of FPL Lands EIS >> Current Page    PUBLIC SCOPING MEETING       DATE START TIME END TIME LOCATION   6/22/11 5:30 PM 8:30 PM Florida International University - Stadium Club Modesto A. Maidique Campus 11200 SW 8th Street Miami, Florida                The NPS will hold a public scoping meeting on June 22, 2011 in the Stadium Club at Florida International University. We encourage you to attend to learn more about the project, have discussions with park staff and provide comments.  Description: The first hour of the meeting will be an open house. NPS staff will be available to discuss the project and answer questions. Maps and displays will provide information about the project objectives, study area, issues, preliminary alternatives and the EIS process. At 6:30 p.m. there will be a brief presentation about the project, followed by a public comment session. Meeting Directions: The Stadium Club is located in the football stadium at FIU. Follow the Florida Turnpike to the Tamiami Trail (SW 8th Street) exit. Take the SW 8th Street EAST exit. Turn RIGHT on SW 117th Avenue. Turn LEFT on SW 17th Street. Turn RIGHT on SW 114 Court. Free parking is located to the LEFT on the south side of the stadium. The Stadium Club is located between Gates 2 and 3.
